name: stippling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of drawing or painting using small spots or marks: Techniques such as stippling required a great deal of time and patience. Glass painting, stippling, and toy-making remain fairly minority interests. See
stipple
More examplesFewer examplesI'm going to teach you how to do stippling.The brush is dragged irregularly over the surface of the painting with a stabbing action, which is technically called stippling.
